oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Agricultural Quarterly Bulletin
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Land use; Farming
Agriculture -- Tennessee; Tennessee. Agriculture, Dept. of
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pamphlet entitled "Quarterly Bulletin of Farm Residences, etc., for Sale in Tennessee" by A. W. Hawkins. Represents the efforts of the Tennessee Department of Agriculture to encourage land sales. Lists, by county, the lands for sale in the state with an emphasis on the agricultural quality of the soil.
A. W. Hawkins was Commissioner of Agriculture, Statistics, Mines, and Immigration for Tennessee.
